title: Adobe Advertising Cloud Profile Full Extension
description: Details related to Adobe Advertising Cloud ExperienceEvent full extension. Contains all Solution added fields.

xdm:syncedRemarketingAudiences.title: Synchronized Segments
xdm:syncedRemarketingAudiences.description: List of search retargeting entities that have been synced with the Adobe Advertising Cloud partner to build audiences on the platform, e.g. RLSA for Google, WCA for Facebook.
